name: Arelot Kingdom MMORPG
description:
A quick note:

Arelot Kingdom is not a complete and full game. It is however online and ready to be played. The economic system is not yet setup. You might find monsters of Lv. 1 which actually should be a higher level. You might find droprates are high while they should be lowered. We are actually still working on the game. The economic system will come in a later stadium. The game is ofcourse playable, but may contain bugs.

We are aware of atleast 1 BUG which will be fixed asap.

- In this bug you have items on your right click option  screen which are not supposed to be there. Clicking on it causes an error.

ofcourse we always try to not create bugs when programming the game. But you can't always think of everything. We believe the game in fact is not a bugged out non working game. In fact it's a working game with 1 known bug.

Arelot Kingdom is a MMORPG game with a great upcoming economic system. 

There are many skills to choose from such as:

  1. Woodcutting
  2. Crafting
  3. Fishing

There are many levels to train:

  1. Ranged
  2. Strength
  3. Attack
  4. Defence
  5. Magic
  6. Health
Features

 

Here are some of the features.

Catch your own food

There is a new skill which enables you to catch fish. This fish can be used for food. There are several spots in the world where you can catch fish.

 

Party sharing

You'll be able to share loot and experience while in a party. The loot and experience will be shared fairly among partymembers qualifying for loot.

 

Skull Up

Certain area's in-game are specially designed for PvP (Player vs Player). When a non-skulled player attacks another non-skulled player, this player will be `punished` and get a skull. having a skull means you risk to lose all your items including equipment and inventory items. Non-skulled players who die in PvP area's only lose every item in their inventory.

 

Amazing Bosses

In-game bosses benefits you from high value drops and great experience. But watch out, these bosses are impossible to kill on your own. You should party up and take turns to have a good chance.

 

 

Craft your items

With plenty of in-game resources such as woodcutting, mining, fishing you're able to craft your own items to make a profit from or to use for yourself.

 

Amazing Quests

Quests are a great way to level-up your stats or to unlock certain area's. The quests range from easy to hard and from short to long. You decide which quests you leave alone and which quests interest you.
